Articles.Content:
I was thinking. Aside from the K syndrome names, what would Kerbals call stars they see in the sky?

Kerbol seems to be the accepted name for their own, so what are the others?

Personally, such things as Kaar (a small binary system 5.3 LY away), Lyp (a blue supergiant 9.6 LY off), and Kenta (a star like their own, 34.6 LY) seem to fit. Fairly short, similar to how they named the planets.
Interesting concepts I'll tell you if I think of something
